charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw Lyra enter the
forest and followed her until reaching a clearing.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0200:
Oh! Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I didn’t expect you here!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0301_0300: I saw you entering the forest.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_0400:
Oh, I see! I was planning on spending the day
with Chikorita, but you would definitely be a
welcome addition!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_0500: I was just in the neighborhood.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_0600:
Oh, I see! I was planning on spending the day
with Chikorita, but you would definitely be a
welcome addition!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0700: I came out here to let Chikorita sunbathe.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_0800:
Well, here we are, Chikorita!
Go find a spot you like!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_1000: Chikorita likes places with good sunlight!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_1200: Of course she is! She’s my partner, after all!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_1300:
You know how they say that the longer the
Pokémon stays with the Trainer, the more
similar they become?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1400:
I love Pokémon—all Pokémon. That’s why I want
to treat all of them the best I can!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1600: Oh, look! It looks like she found a good spot!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1700: Can you smell that sweet scent in the air?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1800: That’s proof that Chikorita is in a good mood.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_1900:
When we were traveling around Johto, she
would let this aroma waft around all the time.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2000:
On sunny days, both she and I would lie down in
the sun...
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2100:
And before we knew it, we would have both
fallen asleep.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2200:
Ahaha, now that I think about it, we may have
made nothing but detours during our travels.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2300:
Admittedly, we treated it like a walk rather than
a journey.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_2500:
Yeah! Traveling gives me a chance to see and
hear and feel things that I might not be able
to otherwise!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_2600: I want to travel around Johto, too.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0402_2700:
Well, let me know when you do! I’ll
show you around! But first, we should
enjoy Pasio as much as possible!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2800:
If you find any good places on Pasio,
let me know!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_2900:
The memories Chikorita and I have with each
other are like the most precious treasure.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3000:
So I’m hoping to find more “treasure”
here on Pasio, too!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3100:
And I was hoping that maybe...you would help
me with that.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0401_3400: Oh, great! That makes me so happy!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_0302_3500: Me? Are you sure about that?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3800:
Aw, shucks. Saying it out loud is kinda
embarrassing, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_3900:
Whatever the case, if you ever need help,
talk to me!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4000: Oh no! Chikorita’s already looking sleepy.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4100: She must have really taken a liking to this spot.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2301_1201_4200:
Well, I guess there’s no helping it, then!
We might as well take a little break ourselves!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0100:
Bzweeeep! My data-interpreting machine is telling
me that your Chikorita is ready to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0200: Wait, really? Chikorita’s about to evolve?!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_1201_0300:
I’m curious about her Evolution, and
I’m wondering how strong you’ll become, Lyra.
OK, continuing analysis!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0101_0100:
I’ve already used my data-interpreting machine on
you. I have a good idea of how strong you are.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0101_0200: Well then, let’s get this battle started!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0100: Wow! You guys are as strong as the rumors say!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0200:
You bet! My Chikorita is as strong
as she is adorable!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0300:
My data-interpreting machine is good to go!
I’m ready to analyze Chikorita once she evolves!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0400: Come on! At least react to what I’m saying!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0500:
This is great! Chikorita looks
like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2311_0501_0600:
Congratulations, Chikorita!
We’re going to have so much more fun!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0100:
Wow, your Bayleef is looking great!
She looks like she’s gonna get even stronger!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0200:
Thanks! Your Servine looks impressive, too,
and full of determination!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0300:
Well, seeing as we’re both so great, why don’t
we have a Pokémon battle?
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_1201_0400: Cool! I’ve always wanted to battle you!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0101_0100:
I think your Bayleef is gonna get even stronger
after this battle.
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0101_0200:
Then let’s get this super-duper,
exciting show on the road!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0100:
Oh no, I lost...
But! As a fellow Grass-type user,
I learned so much! Thank you!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0200:
I should be thanking you! That battle made me
feel infinite possibilities!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0300:
I’m glad.
I’ll be stronger the next time we meet, so get
ready to battle me then!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0400:
Look at that!
Bayleef looks like she’s going to evolve!
charaepi_ch0002_00_kotone/2312_0501_0500: I hope you get even cuter, Bayleef!
